text: The cricket teams of Bangladesh and South Africa have played against each other in ODIs since 2003. They have met on 14 occasions. South Africa is most successful with 13 victories, Bangladesh have won in only 1 game. ==Summary of results== Total Won by Bangladesh Won by South Africa Tie/NR In Bangladesh 6 0 6 0 In South Africa 6 0 6 0 In Neutral Venue 2 1 1 0 Total 14 1 13 0 == List of matches == === In Bangladesh === === In South Africa === === In Neutral Venue === == Related pages == *Bangladesh national cricket team *South Africa national cricket team == References == == Other websites == *ESPNcricinfo Category:Lists of international cricket matches Category:Bangladeshi cricket lists Category:Sport in South Africa Category:South Africa-related lists
title:
